destinations.name: Paris
destinations.funFact: The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer due to thermal expansion.

destinations.name: Tokyo
destinations.funFact: Tokyo is the world's most populous city with over 37 million residents.

destinations.name: New York
destinations.funFact: The Statue of Liberty was a gift from France to the USA in 1886.

destinations.name: Sydney
destinations.funFact: Sydney's Opera House is one of the most recognizable buildings in the world.

destinations.name: Cape Town
destinations.funFact: Table Mountain is one of the New7Wonders of Nature.

destinations.name: Rio de Janeiro
destinations.funFact: The Christ the Redeemer statue is one of the New7Wonders of the World.

destinations.name: Rome
destinations.funFact: Rome has more fountains than any other city in the world.

destinations.name: Istanbul
destinations.funFact: Istanbul is the only city in the world that spans two continents.

destinations.name: Bangkok
destinations.funFact: Bangkok is known as the 'City of Angels' in Thai.

destinations.name: Dubai
destinations.funFact: Dubai is home to the world's tallest building, the Burj Khalifa.
